## Homework 4 

Create your own graph, that is not a scatterplot.

```{r, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

syn <- read.csv("hmk4.csv")

ggplot(syn, aes(x = day, y = cells.mL)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous(trans='log10') +
  theme_minimal() 

```
